column2: IDEA-97356 Link "Specify Master Password" dialog to the Help topic

column3: Fix for http://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-97356. added help links to both ChangeMasterKeyDialog and ResetPasswordDialog. both are directly accessible via Passwords settings or as described in the original issue

Note that your commit does not cause the Help button to appear in the "Change master key" dialog, as it overrides the createActions() method. I'll fix this properly.
Also note that we normally don't use the /** @inheritdoc */ javadoc comments.
